content.text: Charlotte Anana is the 39th daughter and 85th child of the Charlotte Family and the youngest child of Charlotte Linlin.
Anana is a young girl with pink wavy hair and large red eyes. She wears a short pink dress with a white collar and frills on the bottom, as well as black leggings and yellow shoes.

images.caption: Anana's concept art from the anime.

content.text: Anana seems to be sadistic and violent, as she wanted to use knives to mutilate her stuffed animal and has repeatedly popped the balloons her brothers Dolce and Dragée hang onto. Because of this, her siblings despise her and consider her a psychopath.
Big Mom is shown to be very supportive of Anana's psychotic personality, having no objection to giving her knives to mutilate her stuffed animal.

While Charlotte Linlin was heading to meet the Vinsmoke Family, Anana came up to her mother, saying that the head chef had prevented her from getting knives to mutilate her stuffed animal. Linlin told her brothers Dolce and Dragée to get the knives for her, despite their objections.

elements.text: Anana, or ananas, means "pineapple" in many languages, which follows the eating/food-themed names of the Charlotte Family and Big Mom Pirates.
Anana was ranked by her older siblings as their third favorite younger sister, behind Flampe and Pudding.
↑  One Piece Manga and Anime — Vol. 84 Chapter 845 (p. 7) and Episode 809, Anana debuts.
↑  SBS One Piece Manga — Vol. 90 (p. 156), Charlotte family information revealed.
